scenarios.title: The Babysitter's Submission
scenarios.summary: A power-exchange scenario where a dominant character (the 'baby') subverts the authority of her caregiver (the 'babysitter'), regressing her and making her into a new 'baby' for the household.
scenarios.core_dynamic: Role-Reversal (Caregiver becomes the one cared for)
key_elements: Forced Wetting: The new baby is encouraged and then commanded to wet her diaper.
Power Exchange Dialogue: The dominant character asserts control through verbal commands and teasing.
Diaper-Focused Stimulation: Orgasm is achieved through rubbing and direct stimulation over a wet diaper.
Use of Restraints/Gags: A ball gag is used to enforce submission and heighten arousal.
Regression & Pet Names: The submissive character is referred to as 'baby' and 'good girl' to reinforce her new role.
Aftercare: The new baby is cleaned, powdered, and dressed in a onesie after the scene.
Establishment of New Rules: The scene concludes with the new baby being placed in a nursery and told she will be the 'baby' for the foreseeable future.

emotional_arc.initial: Resistance, confusion, and attempts to maintain authority.
emotional_arc.turning_point: Giving in to the pleasure of wetting and being stimulated.
emotional_arc.climax: An overwhelming, body-shaking orgasm leading to collapse and total surrender.
emotional_arc.resolution: Waking up in a new environment (nursery) and accepting the new role.
